alert.note: Alert for Maui Windward West (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued December 05 at 3:42AM HST until December 05 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large northwest (330 degrees) building down the island chain this morning will peak today, then slowly ease through midweek. ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf of 20 to 25 feet along north facing shores. * WHERE...North facing shores. * WHEN...Surf will peak today at the warning level, then lower to the advisory level tonight through Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
